item.title: CVE-2022-2115|2024-08-03T00:24:44.274Z -- unknown -- popup%20anything%20%E2%80%93%20a%20marketing%20popup%20and%20lead%20generation%20conversions
item.description: The Popup Anything WordPress plugin before 2.1.7 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in a frontend page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
